name: 10 key concepts everyone must understand in CFD
description: If you are new to CFD, start here. This series covers all the key concepts you need to become a CFD expert, from A to Z.

01_how-to-derive-the-navier-stokes-equat.heading: How to Derive the Navier-Stokes Equations: From start to end
01_how-to-derive-the-navier-stokes-equat.description: If you want to know how to derive the Navier-Stokes equations, look no further; this article derives them from start to end, with explanations and no omissions!

02_what-are-hyperbolic-parabolic-and-ell.heading: What are Hyperbolic, parabolic, and elliptic equations in CFD?
02_what-are-hyperbolic-parabolic-and-ell.description: What are hyperbolic, parabolic, and elliptic equations in CFD? Learn how to classify them and what they physically represent with examples and derivations.

03_how-to-discretise-the-navier-stokes-e.heading: How to discretise the Navier-Stokes equations
03_how-to-discretise-the-navier-stokes-e.description: Learn how to discretise the Navier-Stokes equation using both the finite difference and finite volume method with explicit and implicit time integration.

04_explicit-vs-implicit-time-integration.heading: Explicit vs. Implicit time integration and the CFL condition
04_explicit-vs-implicit-time-integration.description: Explore the main differences between explicit and implicit time integration techniques, how it relates to the CFL number, and how to ensure stability.

05_space-and-time-integration-schemes-fo.heading: Space and time integration schemes for CFD applications
05_space-and-time-integration-schemes-fo.description: Learn the most common schemes used in finite difference and finite volume CFD solvers, as well as how to integrate in time using explicit and implicit schemes.

06_how-to-implement-boundary-conditions-.heading: How to implement boundary conditions in CFD
06_how-to-implement-boundary-conditions-.description: Learn how to implement boundary conditions for CFD applications and what challenges we face when dealing with open boundary conditions.

07_how-to-solve-incompressible-and-compr.heading: How to solve incompressible and compressible flows in CFD
07_how-to-solve-incompressible-and-compr.description: Learn what challenges exist in solving incompressible and compressible flows and what algorithms exist to solve these equations, all in one article.

08_the-origin-of-turbulence-and-direct-n.heading: The origin of turbulence and Direct Numerical Simulations (DNS)
08_the-origin-of-turbulence-and-direct-n.description: Learn where turbulence is coming from, both from a physical and mathematical point of view, and how to explicitly resolve it using Direct Numerical Simulations.

09_the-introduction-to-large-eddy-simula.heading: The introduction to Large Eddy Simulations (LES) I wish I had
09_the-introduction-to-large-eddy-simula.description: Learn everything there is to know about Large Eddy Simulations in a single article. From Smagorinsky's humble beginnings to advanced subgrid-scale models.

10_all-you-need-to-know-about-rans-turbu.heading: All you need to know about RANS turbulence modelling in one article
10_all-you-need-to-know-about-rans-turbu.description: Learn all there is to know about classical RANS turbulence modelling in CFD in just one single article, including how to create your own RANS model

11_advanced-rans-and-hybrid-ransles-turb.heading: Advanced RANS and hybrid RANS/LES turbulence modelling in CFD
11_advanced-rans-and-hybrid-ransles-turb.description: Take a deep dive into advanced RANS modelling techniques in CFD, including transitional RANS modelling, DES, DDES, IDDES, SAS, and WMLES.

12_mesh-generation-in-cfd-all-you-need-t.heading: Mesh generation in CFD: All you need to know in one article
12_mesh-generation-in-cfd-all-you-need-t.description: Learn all there is to know about mesh generation in CFD, from structured to unstructured algorithms and why mesh quality is so important.
